title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.24 - Berth usage; removal of watercraft
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.24 - Berth usage; removal of watercraft

State Regulations

Every master or person in charge of a watercraft docked
or berthed at a public wharf shall remove his watercraft when ordered so to do
by the Port Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1242.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
